responses: 1: Yes — at least half of subnational districts.
2: Yes — more than half of subnational districts.
citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
notes: Converted from (B) to (A) coding by David Altman.
question: Must a majority across subnational districts (e.g., cantons, provinces, states) be attained in order for a plebiscite to be approved?
name: v2ddadmpl
